# changeCount

**Instance Property**

The receiver’s change count.

## Declaration

```swift
var changeCount: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

The change count starts at zero when a client creates the receiver and becomes the first owner. The change count subsequently increments each time the pasteboard ownership changes.

The change count is also returned from [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPasteboard/clearContents()] and [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPasteboard/declareTypes(_:owner:)]. You can therefore record the value of `changeCount` at the time that you take ownership of the pasteboard and compare it with a later value to determine whether you still have ownership.

## Related Documentation

- **clearContents()**: Clears the existing contents of the pasteboard.
- **declareTypes(_:owner:)**: Prepares the receiver for a change in its contents by declaring the new types of data it will contain and a new owner.

## Getting information about a pasteboard

- **name**: The receiver’s name.
